name: DRIVE (Cyberq)
description:
This idea is tron mixed with infinite runner game 

Controls 

A,D to turn car 

E to change Gear

Player can increase timer by killing enemies with Path

but player have to maintain damage meter to not to die

if timer goes to Zero Game Over

Winning Condition 

Player completing 30 laps

->>Android Build Controls(Only for phones having Gyro sensor )<<-

Tilt you Phone Left or right to move the car 

Swipe Down to Change gear

Android port have infinite laps on this game
